channel.title: Help with EasyRsc please. :(
channel.description:
Okay, so I set my paths, and I downloaded the EasyRsc client.
1. I went into my server.java file in my server and changed "localhost" to my default ip address. 2. I went into my distributed client folder and edited the settings for the client to my actual ip address. 3. I left the default ip adress in the client folder to 127.0.0.1.
Anyway, I compile it all, I open the runserver, then i open the runclient and it says "Unable to connect to server. bla bla bla"
Here is somet pics, it would be greatly appreciated if someone helped me with this. [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/5557/serverk.png[/img]
[img]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/5990/client2.png[/img]

Well, Check your internet settings or try a different world.

item.title: Help with EasyRsc please. :(
item.dc:creator: @thegodmode thegodmode
item.description:
@thegodmode wrote:

Okay, so I set my paths, and I downloaded the EasyRsc client.

  1. I went into my server.java file in my server and changed “localhost” to my default ip address.
  2. I went into my distributed client folder and edited the settings for the client to my actual ip address.
  3. I left the default ip adress in the client folder to 127.0.0.1.

Anyway, I compile it all, I open the runserver, then i open the runclient and it says “Unable to connect to server. bla bla bla”

Here is somet pics, it would be greatly appreciated if someone helped me with this.
